name: Pooliards
description:
Pooliards

This is a simple pool & billiards game. You can play 8-ball or 9-ball mode.

It runs directly in the browser and on most mobile devices.

How to Play:
  • Click anywhere on the screen to aim
  • Hold the shoot button to charge up
    • You can gauge your power with the meter on top or based on how far the pool stick is away from the cue ball
  • Release to shoot the ball

See how fast you can sink all the balls.
